package hello;

public class hello {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int count=0;   //value is 0 
		//int no=0;
		while(count<=10){
			System.out.println(count);
			count=count+1;
			//0>10  0<10
			//no=no+1;
			//count=count+1;
		}
		//System.out.print(count);
	}
}
